label: uncl5237
comment: Code specifying the category of charges.

values.label: All charges
values.comment: All amounts calculated by the carrier in accordance with tariffs or in case of special events during the voyage (e.g. Rail - freights costs - additional costs).

values.label: Additional charges
values.comment: Charges calculated by the carrier for specific events like re-weighting, re-loading, unexpected operations, services required during the voyage, etc.

values.label: Transport charges + additional charges
values.comment: Transport charges plus Additional charges (e.g. for re- loading, re-weighting or unexpected operations) that must be precised in the payment conditions by the consignor (other charges must be taken in account by the consignee).

values.label: Basic freight
values.comment: The basic freight payable on the cargo as per tariff.

values.label: Destination haulage charges
values.comment: Haulage charges for transporting goods to the destination.

values.label: Disbursement
values.comment: Sums paid out by ship's agent at a port and recovered from the carrier.

values.label: Destination port charges
values.comment: Charges payable at the port of destination.

values.label: Miscellaneous charges
values.comment: Miscellaneous charges not otherwise categorized.

values.label: Transport charges up to a specified location
values.comment: Transport charges to be paid by a specified party for a part of a voyage, i.e. up to a specified location.

values.label: Origin port charges
values.comment: Charges payable at the port of origin.

values.label: Origin haulage charges
values.comment: Haulage charges for the pickup of goods at origin.

values.label: Other charges
values.comment: Unspecified charges.

values.label: Specific amount payable
values.comment: Amount that the consignor agrees to be invoiced or to pay. This amount is part of the total charges applied to the consignment.

values.label: Transport costs (carriage charges)
values.comment: Monetary amount calculated on the basis of the transport tariffs or contract eventually including charges or other costs.

values.label: All costs up to a specified location
values.comment: All amounts to be paid by the consignor for a part of the voyage, i.e. up to a location that must be precised. (The remaining part of the voyage to be paid by the consignee) The amounts are calculated by the carrier in accordance with tariffs or in case of special events during the voyage (e.g. rail - freight costs - additional costs).

values.label: Weight/valuation charge
values.comment: Code to indicate weight/valuation charges to be either wholly prepaid or wholly collect.

values.label: All costs
values.comment: All cost elements.

values.label: Supply of certificate of shipment
values.comment: Charges payable for the supply of a certificate of shipment.

values.label: Supply of consular formalities or certificate of origin
values.comment: Charges payable for the supply of consular formalities or certificate of origin.

values.label: Supply of non-categorised documentation in paper form
values.comment: Charges payable for the supply of one or more documents in paper form that are not otherwise categorised.

values.label: Supply of customs formalities, export
values.comment: Charges payable for the supply of export customs formalities.

values.label: Supply of customs formalities, transit
values.comment: Charges payable for the supply of transit customs formalities.

values.label: Supply of customs formalities, import
values.comment: Charges payable for the supply of import customs formalities.
